name: setarg
description: Set an argument that was passed to a function.

params_body.name: arg
params_body.description: The argument sequence number. Use 0 for the first argument.

params_body.name: index
params_body.description: The index (if the argument is an array).

params_body.name: value
params_body.description: The value to set the argument to.

related_fn:
getarg: Retrieve an argument from a variable argument list.
 numargs: Return the number of arguments.
